name: Paleo Salmon Cakes
author: PATTYXLYNN
summary: Super delicious, super fast, super paleo! Serve with a baby spinach salad and even your guests will be impressed! Flaxseed is gluten-free and paleo. Along with the egg, it makes an excellent binder that lets the salmon taste come through.
ingredients: 1 (14.75 ounce) can wild Alaskan salmon, drained
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Combine salmon, flaxseed meal, egg, salt, and pepper in a bowl
Mix well and form into 4 cakes
Heat olive oil in a pan over medium-high heat
Fry salmon cakes until browned, about 4 minutes per side
